pepcb.F90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 ! ==============================================================
00003 !
00004 !
00005 !                  PEPC-B
00006 !
00007 !    Pretty Efficient Plasma Coulomb-solver + B (magnetic fields)
00008 !
00009 !    - Magnetoinductive version of PEPC  
00010 !
00011 !   $ Revision $
00012 !
00013 !   Based on Hashed Oct Tree method of Warren & Salmon
00014 !    plus chunks of vectorised f90 SPK code.
00015 !
00016 !  Major changes:
00017 !   Juelich 27 September 2001: Development begun
00018 !   October 2002:  Completed asynchronous, latency-hiding tree traversal
00019 !   November 2002: Incorporated real-time VISIT interface for beam-plasma system (Wolfgang Frings)
00020 !   February 2003: Parallel sort with load-balancing
00021 !   March 2003:    Ported to IBM p690 cluster
00022 !   April 2003:    tree_walk improved by collating multipole info before shipping 
00023 !   July 2003:     Prefetch added to cut barrier-time in tree_walk
00024 !   June 2005:     Separation of tree routines (now in lpepc) from physics applications
00025 !                  currently include: pepc-e (serial electrostatic version), pepc-b and pepc-g (gravitation)
00026 !
00027 !  See README.compile for summary of program units
00028 !
00029 !  ==============================================================
00030 
00031 program pepcb
00032 
00033   use physvars
00034   use utils
00035   implicit none
00036   include 'mpif.h'
00037 
00038   ! timing stuff
00039   real :: t0, t_key, t_domain, t_build(4), t_branch, t_fill, t_props, t_walk, t_walkc, t_en, t_force
00040   real :: t_push, t_diag, t_start_push, t_prefetch, Tpon, ttot, t_laser
00041   real :: t_loop, t_start_loop, t_end_loop, t_start_prog, t_end_prog
00042   real :: t_record(10000)
00043   integer :: tremain ! remaining wall_clock seconds
00044   integer :: llwrem  ! function to enquire remaining wall_clock time
00045   integer :: ierr, lvisit_active, ifile, incdf
00046   integer :: vbufcols = 22, irecord=0, ico
00047 
00048 !POMP$ INST INIT
00049 !POMP$ INST BEGIN(pepcb)
00050 
00051   ! Initialize the MPI system
00052   call MPI_INIT(ierr)
00053 
00054   call cputime(t_start_prog)
00055 
00056   ! Get the id number of the current task
00057   call MPI_COMM_RANK(MPI_COMM_WORLD, my_rank, ierr)
00058 
00059   ! Get the number of MPI tasks
00060   call MPI_COMM_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, n_cpu, ierr)
00061 
00062   ! Time stamp
00063   if (my_rank==0) call stamp(6,1)
00064   if (my_rank==0) call stamp(15,1)
00065 
00066 
00067   call openfiles       ! Set up O/P files
00068 
00069 
00070   call setup           ! Read input deck, setup plasma config
00071   call setup_arrays    ! Set up field arrays
00072 
00073 ! Allocate array space for tree
00074   call pepc_setup(my_rank,n_cpu,npart_total,theta,debug_tree,np_mult,fetch_mult,debug_rank) 
00075  
00076 ! ---- Preprocess VISIT setup -----------
00077  
00078 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00079 !  if (my_rank ==0 .and. vis_on) call flvisit_spk_init() ! Start up VISIT
00080   if (my_rank ==0 .and. vis_on) then
00081      call flvisit_nbody2_init ! Start up VISIT interface to xnbody
00082      call flvisit_nbody2_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00083 #ifdef NETCDFLIB
00084      if (netcdf) call ncnbody_open(nbuf_max,vbufcols,ngx, ngy, ngz,ncid,incdf)
00085 #endif
00086 
00087   endif
00088 #else
00089 !  ---- No VISIT installed ---------
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 ! ---- end of preprocess -------------
00093 
00094 
00095   if (launch) then
00096     call configure       ! Set up particles
00097 
00098   else
00099     ico=1
00100     do while (.not. launch)
00101         call configure
00102 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00103         call vis_config
00104         if ( mod(ico,ivis) ==0 ) call vis_parts_nbody(ico)       
00105 #endif
00106         if ( mod(ico,ivis_fields)==0 ) then
00107         !     call pot_grid
00108           call densities
00109           call sum_fields
00110 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00111           call vis_fields_nbody(0)
00112 #endif
00113        endif
00114        ico=ico+1
00115     end do
00116   endif
00117 
00118 
00119   if (debug_level >0) then
00120         call diagnostics     ! Initial config
00121   endif
00122 
00123   call cputime(t_start_loop)
00124 
00125   do itime = 1,nt
00126      trun = trun + dt
00127      if (my_rank==0 ) then
00128         do ifile = 6,15,9
00129            write(ifile,'(/a)') '========================================================================'
00130         end do
00131            write(ifile_cpu,'(/a)') '========================================================================'
00132      endif
00133 
00134 
00135 
00136      if (beam_config >= 3) tlaser = tlaser + dt  
00137 
00138      laser_model: select case(beam_config_in)
00139 
00140      case(4,34)
00141         if (tlaser<2*tpulse)  then
00142            Tpon = 2*vosc**2*max(0.,sin(3.14*tlaser/2./tpulse)**2)
00143         ! * (sin(omega*tlaser))**2
00144         else
00145            Tpon=0.
00146         endif
00147      case(14,94) 
00148            Tpon = 2*vosc**2*min(1.,tlaser/tpulse)
00149      case(3) 
00150         Tpon = vosc**2
00151      case(6) 
00152         Tpon = vosc**2*max(0.,sin(3.14*tlaser/2./tpulse)**2)
00153      case(16)
00154         Tpon = vosc**2*min(1.,tlaser/tpulse)
00155      case default
00156         Tpon = 0.
00157      end select laser_model
00158 
00159      write(ifile_cpu,'(//a,i8,(3x,a20,f8.2)/(3x,a,f8.2,a2,f8.2,a4)/a,f9.3)') 'Timestep ',itime+itime_start &
00160           ,' total run time = ',trun &
00161           ,' tlaser = ',tlaser,' (',tlaser*convert_fs,' fs)' &
00162           ,' Laser intensity  = ',Tpon
00163 
00164 
00165      !     tremain=llwrem(0)
00166      if (my_rank==0 ) then
00167         do ifile = 6,15,9
00168            write(ifile,'(//a,i8,(3x,a,f8.2))') &
00169                 ' Timestep ',itime+itime_start &
00170                 ,' total run time = ',trun 
00171            if (debug_level >= 2)  then
00172               write(ifile,'(//(3x,a,f8.2,a2,f8.2,a4)/4(a20,f9.3/))') &
00173                     ' tlaser = ',tlaser,' (',tlaser*convert_fs,' fs)' &
00174                    ,' intensity= ',Tpon &
00175                    ,' x_crit= ',x_crit &
00176                    ,' spot size= ',sigma & 
00177                    ,' theta =  ',theta_beam 
00178               !                ,' remaining wall-clock time (s)= ',tremain 
00179            endif
00180         end do
00181         if (beam_config==5 .or. beam_config==6) then 
00182            write(6,'(5(a,f8.2/))') 'Laser amplitude =',sqrt(Tpon) &
00183                 , 'Pulse length',tpulse &
00184                 , 'Pulse width', sigma &
00185                 , 'Focal position',focus(1) &
00186                 , 'Elapsed',tlaser 
00187         endif
00188      endif
00189 
00190      ! Compute E, B-fields and pot using lpepc
00191      ! Uses internal particle arrays from library (setup up in configure step)
00192      ! # particles on CPU may change due to re-sort
00193 
00194 !POMP$ INST BEGIN(fields)
00195      call pepc_fields_p(np_local, walk_scheme, mac, theta, ifreeze, eps, force_tolerance, balance, force_const, bond_const, &
00196           dt, xl, yl, zl, itime, &
00197           coulomb, bfields, bonds, lenjones, &
00198           t_domain,t_build,t_prefetch,t_walk,t_walkc,t_force, iprot,work_tot) 
00199   
00200 !POMP$ INST END(fields)
00201 
00202         if (np_error>0 .and. itime==1) call error_test(np_error)
00203 
00204      call cputime(t_start_push)
00205      call force_laser(1,np_local)
00206 
00207 
00208 !POMP$ INST BEGIN(integ)
00209 
00210      call integrator
00211 
00212 !POMP$ INST END(integ)
00213 
00214      call cputime(t_push)
00215      call laser            ! laser propagation according to beam_config
00216      call cputime(t_laser)
00217 
00218 !POMP$ INST BEGIN(diagno)
00219 
00220      if (debug_level>=1) then
00221         call diagnostics
00222      endif
00223 
00224 !POMP$ INST END(diagno)
00225 
00226      call cputime(t_diag)
00227 
00228      t_diag = t_diag - t_laser
00229      t_laser = t_laser - t_push
00230      t_push = t_push - t_start_push
00231      ttot = t_domain+SUM(t_build)+t_prefetch+t_walkc+t_walk+t_force + t_push + t_laser
00232      ops_per_sec = work_tot/ttot
00233 
00234      if (my_rank==0 .and. debug_level .ge.0 .and. mod(itime,iprot).eq.0) then
00235         irecord = irecord+1
00236         do ifile = 6,15,9
00237         write(ifile,'(//a/)') 'Timing:  Routine   time(s)  percentage'
00238         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Domains: ',t_domain,100*t_domain/ttot
00239         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Tree-build: ',t_build(1),100*t_build(1)/ttot
00240         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Branches: ',t_build(2),100*t_build(2)/ttot
00241         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Fill: ',t_build(3),100*t_build(3)/ttot
00242         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Props: ',t_build(4),100*t_build(4)/ttot
00243         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Prefetch: ',t_prefetch,100*t_prefetch/ttot
00244         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Walk local: ',t_walk,100*t_walk/ttot
00245         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Walk comm: ',t_walkc,100*t_walkc/ttot
00246         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Forces: ',t_force,100*t_force/ttot
00247         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Pusher: ',t_push,100*t_push/ttot
00248         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Diagnostics: ',t_diag,100*t_diag/ttot
00249 
00250         write(ifile,'(a20,2f12.3,a1)') 'Total: ',ttot,100.
00251         write(ifile,'(a20/a5,7a12/i5,7f12.3)') 'Timing format:', &
00252              ' #CPU','domains','build',' prefetch','walk-local','walk-comm','force','tot' &
00253           ,n_cpu,t_domain,SUM(t_build),t_prefetch,t_walk,t_walkc,t_force,ttot
00254         end do
00255         t_record(irecord) = ttot
00256      endif
00257 
00258   end do
00259   
00260   call cputime(t_end_loop)
00261   t_loop=SUM(t_record(1:irecord))
00262 
00263 
00264   if (scheme ==5 ) then
00265 
00266      if (ramp) call add_ramp(x_plasma)  ! add exponential ramp to front of target
00267      !  ion eqm mode: add electrons before dumping particle positions
00268      call add_electrons
00269      call dump(nt+itime_start)
00270   endif
00271 
00272 
00273   call closefiles      ! Tidy up O/P files
00274 
00275 
00276 ! ---- Preprocess VISIT setup -----------
00277  
00278 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00279 ! if (my_rank ==0 .and. vis_on) call flvisit_spk_close()  ! Tidy up VISIT
00280 if (my_rank==0 .and. vis_on) then 
00281   call flvisit_nbody2_close ! Tidy up VISIT interface to xnbody
00282 #ifdef NETCDFLIB
00283   if (netcdf) call ncnbody_close(ncid,incdf)
00284 #endif
00285 endif
00286 #else
00287 !  ---- No VISIT installed ---------
00288 #endif
00289 ! ---- end of preprocess ----
00290 
00291   ! Time stamp
00292   if (my_rank==0) call stamp(6,2)
00293   if (my_rank==0) call stamp(15,2)
00294 
00295   call cputime(t_end_prog)
00296 
00297   if (my_rank==0) then
00298         
00299      write(*,'(a20,2f12.3)') 'Loop total, average: ',t_loop, t_loop/irecord
00300      write(*,'(a20,2f12.3)') 'Loop+diags: ',t_end_loop-t_start_loop
00301      write (*,'(a20,f14.4)') 'Total run time: ',t_end_prog-t_start_prog
00302   endif 
00303 
00304   ! End the MPI run
00305   call MPI_FINALIZE(ierr)
00306 
00307 !POMP$ INST END(pepcb)
00308 
00309 end program pepcb
